snippet: Tim Russell, a former aide to Gov. Scott Walker, and Kevin Kavanaugh, an appointee to the Milwaukee County Veteran Service Commission, were arrested Thursday on felony embezzlement charges.
abstract: Tim Russell, a former aide to Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker, and Kevin Kavanaugh, an appointee to the Milwaukee County Veteran Service Commission, are arrested on felony embezzlement charges, as part of a continuing criminal investigation that centers on people who served during Mr Walker’s tenure as Milwaukee County executive.
lead_paragraph: Tim Russell, a former aide to Gov. Scott Walker, and Kevin Kavanaugh, an appointee to the Milwaukee County Veteran Service Commission, were arrested Thursday on felony embezzlement charges.

headline.seo: Wisconsin: Ex-Aides of Gov. Scott Walker Accused of Embezzling
headline.main: Wisconsin: Ex-Aides of Walker Accused of Embezzling
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Ex-Aides of Walker Accused of Embezzling
